alert.note: Alert for Western Hampden (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:19PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A slow moving thunderstorm may cause minor flooding for portions of northwestern Hartford and southwestern Hampden Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 217 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Winsted, or 9 miles northeast of Torrington, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Hartland, Granville and Tolland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.
